jobTitle: Business Development or Sales Intern in Singapore
description: Are you excited to take on new challenges? Help us drive Parcel Perform’s growth and join our team!  Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing Business Development Intern to contribute to the company’s rapid and sustainable growth!  DO YOU Have excellent communication skills Feel comfortable reaching out to potential customers to demonstrate our services and product Want to be at the forefront of the e-commerce logistics scene Love going beyond your comfort zone Responsibilities Discovering and pursuing new sales prospects, converting cold leads into potential business and maintaining customer satisfaction Actively seek out new sales opportunities through networking and social media (e.g. Xing, LinkedIn etc) Ensure continuous deal flow for our sales teams and demonstrations Set up online and onsite meetings with potential clients and listen to their wishes and concerns Prepare appropriate presentations on products and services Participate on behalf of the company in exhibitions or conferences Collaborate with team members to drive continuous improvement Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share with internal teams Requirements  We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop to deliver an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world. You need to feel the same way about our offering and bring along the following things: Fantastic organizational skills Experience in telemarketing / inside sales is a plus High interpersonal skills, ability to identify the needs of our customers Results-driven personality with efficient time management A willingness to keep learning and pushing yourself to higher and higher levels Bachelor's degree or more (in the making) WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!  We are on a mission together to change the e-commerce logistics world and are in it for the journey and the opportunities it offers to all of us. Become part of the team and experience the excitement of contributing to this incredible team effort. The opportunity to work in a fast growing, super exciting and innovative business that will revolutionize the e-commerce logistics industry. You will be the needle of success on the growth of a global product that will become a key platform behind successful e-commerce logistics worldwide. The ability to continuously learn and develop in an international setting with you being a critical driver behind the success of us achieving our mission. An environment where everybody never stops growing, and focuses on succeeding - we continuously work with you on your strengths and weaknesses across many important dimensions, and look at ways for you to address them and further your development. Your entry ticket into being part of the Parcel Perform start-up universe, where you will work with and alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication. About Us  Parcel Perform is the leading delivery experience platform. It enables modern e-commerce enterprises to create unique end-to-end customer journeys and optimize logistics operations with powerful data integrations, parcel tracking, delivery notifications and logistics performance reports in real-time.  Parcel Perform's scalable SaaS platform executes more than 100M parcel updates daily and integrates with 700+ carriers. The data-first company is pioneering innovative ML / AI use cases in e-commerce logistics including its 'Date of Arrival' prediction engine. Parcel Perform is the partner of choice for top brands, marketplaces and carriers across all major verticals globally.  In August, we successfully secured US$20M in Series A investments led by blue-chip investors such as Cambridge Capital and SoftBank Ventures Asia. Parcel Perform believes in growing our dynamic and diverse team with the best talent to assist our global expansion. We have a myriad of talented individuals who have assisted in helping us achieve profitability. Join us while we grow in technology, talent and teamwork.  For more information, please visit www.parcelperform.com
industries: Computer Software

description: Job Purpose  Management Trainee will undergo 2 years’ training program to become an Outlet Manager with the Job Purpose and Main Duties as below:  This position is responsible for the daily operations of an outlet, including the selection, development and performance management of employees, overseeing the inventory and ordering of food and supplies, optimising profits and ensuring that customers are satisfied with their dining experience.  Main Duties Oversee and manage all areas of an outlet assigned to the job holder and accountable to the Area Manager for the delivery of efficient, quality and profitable service. Keep Area Manager promptly and fully informed of all issues and take prompt corrective action where necessary or suggest alternative courses of action. Adhere to Han’s standards and service levels to increase sales and minimise costs, including food, beverage, supplies, utility and labour costs. Ensure that all daily sale collections are securely banked and personnel/payroll related administrative duties are completed accurately, on time and in accordance to Han’s policies and procedures. Enforce sanitary practices for food handling, general cleanliness, and maintenance of kitchen and dining areas. Ensure compliance with operational standards and Han’s policies. Ensure consistent high quality of food preparation and service. Supervise portion control and quantities of preparation to minimise waste. Estimate food needs and work with Central Procurement to place orders and schedule delivery. Ensure customer service in all areas. Respond to complaints, and take appropriate immediate corrective actions. Educate staff on prevention of future occurrence. Ensure that proper security procedures are in place to protect staff, customers and company assets. Ensure safe working and guest environment to reduce the risk of injury and accidents. Complete accident reports promptly in the event a customer or employee is injured. Management shifts which include: daily decision making, scheduling and planning. Interview job applicants. Direct recruitment, supervision, development and, when necessary, termination of employment of employees. Conduct orientation which includes safety briefing, and oversee the training of new employees. Develop employees by providing ongoing feedback, establishing performance expectations and by conducting performance appraisal. Requirements Diploma with 1-year experience working in the F&B or Hospitality Industry Need to perform shift work and work on Public Holiday and weekends 6 days work per week Physically fit as require to stand long hours

description: Flash Coffee is Asia's fastest-growing tech-enabled specialty coffee chain. We aim to democratize high-quality coffee to make it accessible to Asia's rising middle class. We serve up an award-winning coffee menu at affordable prices in stores and via our mobile app for customers who prefer a quick grab-and-go. Already operating in five countries, we are on a trajectory to launch an additional five countries across Asia Pacific by 2022.  We're a Series A startup with funding from White Star Capital, known for backing the likes of food-tech giant Freshly and Dollar Shave Club, along with Delivery Hero, the parent company of foodpanda and one of the largest food delivery companies in the world. We also count Rocket Internet (known for incubating the likes of foodpanda, Lazada, Zalora, and more) as well as Global Founders Capital, which has backed global successes such as Facebook, LinkedIn, and Slack.  What You'll Do: Work side by side with the local MD & Venture Development Team on driving the execution of the business' most critical venture development projects Venture development projects involve topics across all departments - with a focus on achieving revenue growth & maximum operational efficiency Local venture development projects include, but are not limited to: launching new products & verticals, facilitating new sales channels & B2B partnerships, implementing tech solutions, etc Identify and evaluate potential venture development opportunities specific to your local market Partner with the MD & Venture Development Team to analyze initiatives and generate business case Co-ordinate with other local & regional teams to ensure the effective roll-out of venture development initiatives Measure, analyse and optimise our business processes on a project basis  Who You Are: You are a current or recent MBA (Masters) student in business administration, general management or international business You have an unmatched interest in food and beverage trends You have creative problem solving skills combined with strong analytical skill set  What We Offer: Being part of a fast-growing start-up with hands on exposure from day one A vibrant and international team

description: About Xfers  Xfers as a part of Fazz Financial Group portfolio — a holding company of over 10 FinTech startups dedicated to enabling financial access for everyone — is on a mission to provide financial access to millions of underserved communities in Southeast Asia through building a financial ecosystem that anyone can participate in safely. Our range of last-mile financial rails power businesses across Southeast Asia - from startups to family businesses. By removing the pain of setting up and managing digital payments, more business owners can focus on growing their business, in turn encouraging fairer and healthier competition, and fostering stronger, more vibrant economies. For more information, visit: www.xfers.com  But there is much more to do. We know how important our mission is to the improving the livelihoods of millions of people in Southeast Asia, and that's why we're looking for passionate and driven people to join us to accelerate financial access for everyone.  About StraitsX  The StraitsX team is building the payments infrastructure for Digital Assets in Southeast Asia. We aim to connect millions of individuals and businesses in the region to the Digital Assets market through our suite of products, including Xfers Wallet and Xfers Direct. In 2020, we released our first stablecoin, XSGD, the largest stablecoin in Asia by supply.  For more information, visit:https://www.xfers.com/sg/straitsx  Responsibilities  As a business development intern at Xfers, you will play an instrumental role in fuelling Xfers' growth in the Singapore market. You will be focused on acquiring new merchants and servicing current accounts. You will be part of the StraitsX team and reporting to the Business Development Manager.  Our team is looking for a highly motivated colleague to help support building up our business in Singapore. The ideal candidate is a driven and strategic networker who thrives in a fast-paced, diverse and entrepreneurial environment.  What you'll be doing Drive client acquisition, onboard merchant and corporate accounts across our digital assets products - Xfers Wallet, Xfers Direct, XSGD Develop and nurture relationships with stakeholders at new and existing clients, collaborate across teams from client organization if required Responding to clients’ questions, expedite the resolution of problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction for client retention Generate data-driven sales reports and results Support key stakeholders such as Compliance, Product, Product operations, the management to optimize sales operations What we are looking for in you Excellent interpersonal skills, including the ability to quickly build rapport with internal and external senior stakeholders You are forward-thinking and approach challenges with a solution-orientated approach Team player and you are comfortable and determined in dealing with challenging situations (i.e. objection handling, overcoming gatekeepers, etc.) Solid organization, multi‐tasking, and prioritization skills, including acute attention to detail as well as effective time management Tech-savvy with good knowledge of using G-suite (Gmail, Google Drive, Google docs, sheets, etc.) It would be a plus point if you have exposure and broad understanding of the Digital Assets and FinTech sector We love reviewing all the applications we receive, but unfortunately, we may not be able to get back to everyone individually. If we’d like to move forward with your application, we’ll definitely be in touch!  Xfers is an equal opportunity employer. Individuals seeking employment at Xfers will be considered without regard to race, religion, national origin, age, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, medical condition, ancestry, physical or mental disability, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws.  By submitting your application, you agree that Xfers may collect your personal data for recruiting, regional organization planning, and related purposes.
industries: Computer Software, Internet, and Financial Services

description: Job Reference #  235783BR  City  Singapore, Singapore  Your role  Do you want to help our clients buy and sell equities, foreign currencies, interest rates and credit? You’ll help our clients buy and sell on the phone and using our online systems (on a client team) be promoting products and trading opportunities to clients based on an in-depth understanding of their needs and investment styles (as a sales trader) be the link between clients and traders, giving clients useful information about what’s happening in the markets and executing their trades at the best prices (as a trader) seek the best prices to execute our clients’ sales orders and make markets in listed and over-the-counter equities, equity derivatives and equity-linked securities  Your team  You’ll be working in Global Markets, looking after professional investors like asset managers and fund managers. You’ll give them advice and do everything that’s needed to buy and sell securities for them. From start to finish. You’ll be able to draw on the strength of our platforms, products, services and people worldwide to give your clients whatever they need.  Diversity helps us grow, together. That’s why we are committed to fostering and advancing diversity, equity, and inclusion. It strengthens our business and brings value to our clients.  Your expertise  You need to be graduating in 2023, and with less than two years of work experience. It doesn’t matter what you’re studying. (Really, it doesn’t.) But we’d like to see evidence that you can analyze a problem, take a view and come to a decision plan, organize and communicate well make things happen stick with a task work in a team come up with ideas Perhaps you’ve organized a fundraising event or taken part in team sports? Or persevered and passed an exam in a subject you found challenging? Think about how things you’ve achieved match the skills we’re after.  About Us  Expert advice. Wealth management. Investment banking. Asset management. Retail banking in Switzerland. And all the support functions. That's what we do. And we do it for private and institutional clients as well as corporations around the world.  We are about 60,000 employees in all major financial centers, in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?  Join us  We're a truly global, collaborative and friendly group of people. Having a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace is important to us. And we support your career development, internal mobility and work-life balance. If this sounds interesting, apply now.  Disclaimer / Policy Statements  UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.
industries: Banking, Financial Services, and Investment Banking

jobTitle: Business Developer Intern - Amazon Seller Services (July to December 2022)
description: Description The duration for this internship opportunity is from July to December 2022 Applicants to this internship opportunity will need the work authorization for Singapore Work hard. Have fun. Make history. At Amazon we expect no more and no less from you. Ever since Amazon opened its virtual doors, it has been the aim to become the most customer-centric company in the world. How is this achieved? By having people like you who make sure that customers find everything that they are looking for online – at great prices and convenience.  Amazon is looking for a highly motivated Business Development Intern to help drive lead generation and qualification, and sales enablement to support the third-party Sellers for Amazon.sg. This role offers the unique opportunity to support third-party Sellers across SEA to expand their business from prospecting, qualifying and educating sellers to be successful via both high touch and scalable support. The ideal candidate will also be in charge of projects to support the Amazon Seller Services Business in meeting its account acquisition and output goals. Specifically, this individual will be responsible for building lead databases, creating customized assets for driving sales enablement and drive adoption across 1:many and 1:1 communications.  Background on Amazon Seller Services: The Marketplace or “Selling on Amazon” business exists in 20 countries and exceeds 50% of total Amazon unit sales and growing. Each year, tens of thousands of businesses join the marketplace adding millions of new products. Amazon’s vision is to offer the earth’s largest product selection and lowest prices for our customers. One way we deliver on this vision is by marketing to local country Sellers to persuade them to launch their products onto the platform thereby maximizing the quantity of items that they list while ensuring the highest quality of product images and information.  Core Responsibilities For This Role Include Prospect, call, and qualify the highest potential Selling Partners that deliver competitive selection, pricing and product availability to our Customers. Analyze and proposed the lead source strategy by product categories split by domestic and oversea sellers Implement and track metrics for recording the success and quality of the sellers, along with maintain SOPs on Salesforce Create customized assets for driving sales enablement and drive adoption across 1:many and 1:1 communications - from pitching, seller education, SOPs, category insights to best practices in driving seller performance Initiated, owned and launched Seller Referral Program Present a report on the above projects, including performance analysis, learning and next steps/recommendations by the end of internship  Basic Qualifications Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree Expected to graduate after December 2022 Able to commit for a full-time internship from July to December 2022 Possess the required work rights for Singapore Strong written and verbal communication skills in English Strong passion for sales Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Great team player Highly analytical with the ability to manipulate data Ability to work in fast-paced environment and deal with ambiguity Intermediate Microsoft Office Skills, particularly Excel Preferred Qualifications Prior internship/experience in lead generation/qualification and sales in e-commerce or consumer products companies Ability to quickly adapt to changing priorities and generate innovative solutions fast-pace environment Experience using analytical, marketing, and productivity tools including Oracle Business Intelligence, Salesforce or other CRM tools, Microsoft OneNote, and Microsoft SharePoint. Ability to meet deadlines, prioritize workloads, maintain a strong attention to detail, and work independently in a fast-pace and rapidly changing environment  Company - Amazon Asia-Pacific Holdings  Job ID: A1726117
industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

description: Job Description  If you enjoy working in an innovative environment, we have a great opportunity for you!  SEPPURE is a separation-tech company developing novel membrane materials and membrane processes for sustainable chemical separations without the use of heat. SEPPURE is disrupting the energy-intensive chemical separation processes, such as distillation and evaporation, through the introduction of novel chemical-resistant nanofiltration membranes. With up to 15% of the world’s total energy spent on industrial-scale chemical separations, SEPPURE’s sustainable process facilitates decarbonisation by substantially reducing global energy use, emissions, and pollution.  We are currently working on several projects to fabricate robust nanofiltration membranes for solvent separation and design membrane systems for vegetable oil, pharmaceutical, petrochemical, and fine-chemical industries.  We have an opportunity for BUSINESS & STRATEGIC DEVELOPMENT INTERNSHIP placement in Singapore.  Role Summary  Tasks Include  The applicant will be assigned to the Business Development team and will be involved in critical business development activities including identification and preparation for upcoming opportunities (Capture) and responding to project solicitation (Proposals). Conduct primary and secondary market research, and assist with the development, of forecasting models, metrics, and analyses to drive key business decisions. Leverage analytics tools to identify megatrends, size the market, perform competitive landscape analysis, financial modelling, and develop pricing strategies. Participate in the RFP process, creation of sales proposals and client presentations/pitches. Provide insightful research on prospective clients and target industries Contribute to strategic planning sessions and collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to understand the business needs. Ability to take on additional responsibilities and grow. Requirements And Qualifications BBA undergraduates in the 3rd or 4thyear, preferably majoring in either business analytics, finance, business economics, statistical analysis, or marketing. Proficient in MS Office (Word, Excel and Powerpoint). Knowledge in Macros/VBA is an advantage. Meticulous, detail oriented, and possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to accept and thrive in an environment of constant deadlines and pressure. Excellent English verbal and written communication skills. Able to commit for at least 5 months. To learn more, visit https://www.seppure.com/  We thank all applicants in advance for their interest; however, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
industries: Chemicals, Oil & Energy, and Biotechnology

description: Description  The pricing team is one of the four pillars of the Revenue office in Zalora. As the pricing team, we optimize profit and increase conversion rates with the goal of providing better pricing values for our customers.  The Revenue office is a newly formed department led by the Chief Revenue Officer which comprises four teams - Pricing, PMO, Merchandising, and Analytics. We consider the product, customer and tech platform as constraints and we use all the levers at our disposal (price, campaign, search, sorting, and processes around them) to get the best possible performance (read Sales and Profit) out of them.  We are looking for an analytical and process-oriented intern who is interested in learning more about the e-commerce industry. This role is responsible for supporting the pricing team in their day-to-day task to manage Non-Apparel categories such as Sports, Shoes, and Accessories in Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Indonesia, and Philippines.  Responsibilities Assist pricing team in the weekly maintenance of onsite prices. Work closely with internal/external stakeholders to manage project communication and coordination. Assist pricing team in monitoring sales and driving the growth of Non-apparel categories performance. Ad hoc duties as assigned. Requirements From Business, Economics, Mathematics, Engineering, or related disciplines. Results-driven with attention to detail, analytical mindset Strong understanding of MS Excel (especially in Pivot Table, Vlookup etc) Knowledge of SQL and Tableau Should be a self-starter, quick learner, go-getter, with the ability to learn and thrive in a fast-paced environment Preferably 6 months commitment

description: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, Moscow, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.  The Ethics Office - Communications Intern  At The Ethics Office you are empowered to learn, lead and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you're celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team. Are you in?  Our Exciting Opportunity We are currently looking for a communications resource to support the development and production of content assets for internal marketing and communications activities. In this position, you will have the opportunity to work with several teams, locally as well as teams across countries. This position will be based in Singapore. The foundation is being able to understand the communication needs of our employee audience, and turn them into ideas, designs, concepts, and communication plans to support employee communications and activities to strengthen the ethical culture at ByteDance.  You will - Write and create content for our internal communications channels, such as our wiki pages and our internal social media channels, to support The Ethics Office messages and strategies - Copywriting, drafting articles for internal and external purposes (experience with technical content is a plus) - Utilize strategic planning templates to present and share campaign information, timing and priorities, etc. - Contribute and challenge processes as part of continuous improvement ethos - Be part of various other projects, such as internal campaigns, promotional videos and more.  Qualifications To be successful in the role, we’d love it if you have - Be currently enrolled in law school or a recent graduate of law school. - Have the ability to take ownership of projects and drive them to completion - Have a desire to learn and apply marketing/sales concepts in a real-world environment - Have excellent verbal and written communication skills and be comfortable working in both a team environment and on solo projects - Video/Visual production knowledge (Photoshop), content marketing skills and an agile learning mindset - Excellent proficiency in verbal & written English and Mandarin  Internship Period: at least 6 months, this could lead to a long-term opportunity.  TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

description: Our Business: As the market leader in a wide variety of sectors, Technoform has more than 45 factories and sales offices across Europe, America and Asia-Pacific, employing over 1,400 colleagues worldwide. Our expanding global presence offers rewarding opportunities to help trainees and entry-level professionals kick-start their careers.  Our core know-how is in the field of precision plastic extrusion, where we develop innovative solutions for a broad variety of industries and markets. From sales to manufacturing, we help trainees and entry-level professionals to find the position best suited to them, offering a variety of opportunities as part of a diverse, international team.  About the role: • Exposure to the different business functions such as logistics, quality, marketing, digitalization and business development. • Explore, identify and implement improvement projects in different business functions to bring value add. • Work on digitalization projects across different business units to drive for better efficiency.  About you: • Pursuing a Bachelors degree in Engineering or Science with an expected graduation date of December 2021 or later. • Looking for a minimum of 3 months internship • Ability to learn quickly in a rapidly changing environment • Excellent organizational, analytical skills and attention to detail • Superb communication skills

JOB DESCRIPTIONS It’s a full-time internship that needs 40 hours in the office per week and at least 5-6 months of commitment.  Assist in marketing and advertising promotional activities (e.g. social media, direct mail, and web) as well as monitoring social media campaigns and social postings Rebranding of the entire website and writing content that displays the company’s vision and purpose Creating content for the company’s blog and social media pages Proposing photo angles for social media in accordance with the company’s style guide Attending video shoots to take behind-the-scenes photos and/or videos Editing of photos and/or videos for posting on social media Designing of Marketing collateral Developing and researching marketing articles Other marketing opportunities and partnership lookouts Assisting in writing content for blog posts Any other ad hoc administrative duties as assigned Creating and editing content for current customers.  Support sales team to general leads through research and cold emails (cold calling where necessary)  REQUIREMENTS Good understanding of different marketing techniques that could be implemented for a boutique software design company like Hipster Pte Ltd. Send out introductory cold emails to prospective clients to enquire about IT support we can offer. Excellent in Storytelling in business. Excellent verbal and written communication skills Excellent knowledge of Google docs and Google spreadsheets. Familiarity with Selling computer software and online applications (e.g. CRM tools, Online analytics, and Google Adwords) Basic Knowledge of SEO (Search Engine Optimization) and SEM (Search Engine Marketing) is preferred.  Current enrollment in a related diploma or bachelor degree in a recognized university, preferably in Information Systems / Computer Science related majors Comfortable selling to, influencing, and building trust-based, value-added relationships with senior executives. Able to solve problems and manage ambiguity by use of common sense and basic business acumen. Ability to work in an independent, fast-paced, startup environment, and be comfortable with ambiguity.

About Workato  Workato is the only integration and automation platform that is as simple as it is powerful — and because it's built to power the largest enterprises, it is quite powerful.  Simultaneously, it's a low-code/no-code platform. This empowers any user (dev/non-dev) to painlessly automate workflows across any apps and databases.  We're proud to be named a leader by both Forrester and Gartner and trusted by 7,000+ of the world's top brands such as Box, Grab, Slack, and more. But what is most exciting is that this is only the beginning.  Why join us?  Ultimately, Workato believes in fostering a flexible, trust-oriented culture that empowers everyone to take full ownership of their roles. We are driven by innovation and looking for team players who want to actively build our company.  But, we also believe in balancing productivity with self-care. That's why we offer all of our employees a vibrant and dynamic work environment along with a multitude of benefits they can enjoy inside and outside of their work lives.  If this sounds right up your alley, please submit an application. We look forward to getting to know you!  Also, feel free to check out why Business Insider named us an 'enterprise startup to bet your career on"! #WeAreBlushing  Responsibilities  We are looking for an exceptional Product Management Intern to join our growing team.. In this role, you will research and propose potential product growth opportunities. You will also be responsible to: Gather, develop and communicate ideas between customers, partners and team members Study and understand the product, market and competition Create feature specifications and mocks Engage with sales, marketing, customer success for product release Gather data, monitor, analyze and optimize data to help formulate plans for subsequent product launches Design, plan, launch, monitor, analyze and optimize a product serving various personas (IT, Ops, Sales, CS, HR) in various industries (higher ed, software, hardware, consumer, retail)  [This is a 6 month internship. The opportunity to transit into a permanent, full-time position may be offered to you depending on your work performance amongst other factors.]  Requirements  Qualifications / Experience / Technical Skills Passionate and driven about delivering differentiated products A critical thinker who loves to examine and rationalise information presented to you Thoughtful team player, a quick learner, and have a "can do" attitude with a growth mindset Fast mover and comfortable navigating a fast-paced environment Excellent written and oral communication skills in English, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts effectively to a non-technical audience Comfortable articulating ideas and influencing others Strong organizational skills and attention to detail to juggle multiple projects simultaneously

description: Coty is a world leader in beauty and home to an illustrious roster of cosmetic, skincare and fragrance brands. And our company has a mission: to challenge the definition of beauty, to encourage authenticity and celebrate diversity. Because to us at Coty, beauty isn’t about conforming to somebody else’s ideal. It’s about inclusion and liberating everyone to shine in their unique way.  Coty helps millions of people around the world express your beauty, your way through our rich portfolio covering fragrance, skin care, colour cosmetics, and body care. Our brands include global icons like Gucci, Burberry, Hugo Boss, Calvin Klein, Philosophy, Max Factor, Rimmel, Bourjois, Sally Hansen, Adidas, David Beckham, etc. With more than one billion products shipped each year, the possibilities for self-expression are endless.  THE ROLE About the Role… FP&A Intern is a co-pilot role within the Travel Retail Finance function. The intern would be closely partnering with the finance team and the multi-functional team spread across the region. The incumbent will get exposure to working across functions and markets in an exciting and fast-paced environment of the duty-free world.  This role will assist with all end-to-end planning, reporting and analysis activities for the Cluster to deliver a high standard of reporting and analytical support to the business. Support includes financial, business and market analysis and special projects as required.  KEY RESPONSIBILITIES  Financial Planning and Analysis Assist to manage Travel Retail Asia Pacific’s end-to-end planning, reporting and analysis activities Help in management reporting processes and the preparation and development of reports for Business Analysis and Operations Prepare reports and tools to assess and analyse monthly and quarterly business performance Ensure consistency in quality and quicker turnaround time for reporting Support the Travel Retail Asia Pacific CFO and Controller in constantly interrogating results versus plan, and the latest forecasts to ensure financial commitments are delivered.  Budgeting and reporting Assist the Brand Finance Controller with Budget management and tracking Prepare and provide meaningful financial management information and reports including: Customer profitability, brand and house profitability, monthly supplementary statistical reporting and daily sales Ensure reports are submitted in a timely fashion, completely and accurately, in particular the Monthly Business Update (MBU), Weekly Flash updates and Annual Plan. Provide advanced modelling and analysis of data and reports as required by key stakeholders across the business including the Marketing Category teams, Business Development and Corporate Lead and/or participate in ad-hoc projects as required  WHAT YOU’LL BRING ESSENTIAL: Able to commit for at least 6 months (Jan to Jun 2022) for a full-time internship. Skilled in the use of MS Office tools including Outlook (or related email tool) Excel, Word and PowerPoint. Self-Motivated, with a strong work ethic and a sense of confidentiality. Possesses cross-cultural awareness and high emotional intelligence. Articulate, with the ability to work in a fast-paced environment. Good balance of a professional attitude while having fun. Strong interest in consumer goods, makeup and beauty products. Strong desire to learn along with a strong sense of ownership. Persuasive, resilient and flexible, able to easily adapt to new challenges. Passionate, enthusiastic and driven to regularly follow-up with loose ends. Able to thrive despite challenges while adopting a positive attitude under pressure.  DESIRABLE Under Graduates with Finance/Accounting as major and interest towards FMCG/Luxury Advanced knowledge of Excel, Well versed with Excel and SAP, Introduction to Hyperion preferred Planning, organizing and coordinating – able to plan and coordinate efforts both within areas of functional responsibility and across divisions and geographies. Analytical capability – strong analytical capabilities with a solid understanding of key business drivers and ability to add value to the decision-making processes of the business through high level, strategic analysis and insights Leadership – able to lead by example, inspire, motivate, engage, and drive results through others ensuring alignment to organisational priorities, goals and targets Presentation skills – ability to present and communicate with confidence. Influencing skills – able to demonstrate above average negotiation and relationship building capabilities. Change leader – able to embrace and accelerate change in a fast-paced environment and pioneer new ideas and approaches  Our people make us who we are. They are the brightest minds bringing the boldest ideas to life every day. If you’re the kind of person who refuses to settle, if you want to think bigger, learn faster and go further than you ever thought possible – we’d love to hear from you.  Interested applicants may also send an email directly to LiFang_Tng@cotyinc.com.
industries: Cosmetics

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES Work as part of a team to serve as liaison between all divisions; training, marketing and sales Assist in the coordination and execution of training initiatives and plans Monitor and update Training Excel Sheet on a monthly basis Using Training Excel Sheet, track, download all mobile learning courses from SharePoint, send for translation and upload to WLB Update BA and GS Training Handouts for all new launches across all categories Consolidate, coordinate and mail out adhoc items needed for each market Assist in sourcing and procurement of tools needed for new store opening or store operation needs Consolidate forecast for global makeup tools Place order, organise and track Welcome gifts, New Launch BA gifts, and Training Testers Participate in meetings when needed and provide suggestions or feedback for any sort of improvement   WHAT YOU’LL BRING ESSENTIAL: Able to commit for at least 6 months (Jan to Jun 2022) for a full-time internship. jobTitle: Internship / Apprenticeship Program in Business Development
description: OUTLINE OF OUR PROGRAMME  At Frost & Sullivan you will have numerous growth opportunities and experiences available to you. As an intern at Frost & Sullivan, you will be part of a dynamic, global team that strives for excellence in work and social engagements. The average person spends most of their adult lives at work, yet few feel that their contributions are important or that they are being challenged. As an intern at Frost & Sullivan, you will be encouraged to develop your intellectual curiosity, will learn to leverage visionary innovation to address the global challenges of collapse, disruption, transformation and be provided the ability to collaborate across various levels of the company. As an intern you will be assigned in projects encompassing one of the three key areas that we focus on:  VISION & STRATEGY The ability to visualize and articulate a possible future state for an organization or company has always been a vital component of a company's transformational growth. Disruption of the global economy, industry, companies and investments make it difficult to prepare for the future. As an intern working on engagements related to this area, you will have the opportunity to learn research as well as analytical skills.  BRAND & DEMAND Continually increasing competitive intensity creates infinite choices for consumers. It is becoming increasingly difficult to make a brand stand out in a densely crowded marketplace. Companies are looking for ways to connect with customers and develop lasting loyalty with customers that are willing to advocate for their brand. In this area you will be exposed to digital and content marketing solutions.  TECHNOLOGY & IP The rapid pace of industry convergence and the exponential creation of disruptive technologies are providing unprecedented opportunities. Competitive innovation is the cornerstone for every business and that leads to the development of intellectual property. You will have the opportunity to work on research in new and innovative technologies and their impact on society and businesses.  JOB SCOPE (responsibilities include but not limited to) To grow and maintain existing key accounts. Determine and understand clients’ needs through Frost & Sullivan Growth Strategy Dialogue. To support and update business activities on CRM platform. Work closely with the sales team to communicate leads and any information obtained pertaining to the business development. Utilize social networking tools to identify and pursue new leads within assigned accounts/territories. Make outbound prospecting calls and communicate via email and social media with C-level executives. Enter documentation regarding all client activities and communications into a company database system in an accurate and timely manner. Participate, as needed, in all aspects of the sale including; conducting qualifying activities and client meetings, needs assessments, delivering formal presentations and proposals, and closing new business.  Qualifications Undergraduates / pre-university students. Candidates should have good oral & written communication skills in English and be eligible to work in the country of application.  Benefits Participation in Company activities/ events. Mentorship with industry experts. Performance evaluation & feedback. Certificate upon successful completion.  #LI-CN1

Urban Space is a highly energetic company who pride itself as having a mentoring and open culture. We value team spirit and empower our interns and staff in their daily work and responsibilities. Do you dream of working in a company that is driven by a meaningful purpose? An inclusive company that empowers you to do your best and be innovative?  At Schneider Electric, we believe access to energy and digital is a basic human right. We empower all to do more with less, ensuring Life Is On everywhere, for everyone, at every moment. We provide energy and automation digital solutions for efficiency and sustainability.  We are looking for a 6 months intern to join us for the period of January to June 2022.  The intern will join the Home & Distribution team. Home & Distribution is part of our Product offering in Final Low Voltage & Wiring Devices range such as switches and Miniature Circuit Breaker (MCB).  What will you do?  Strategy Planning Supporting the Channel Sales Lead and Head of Sales on translating the Global Playbook into actionable initiatives in the country and in charge of Global and Local Initiatives Supporting the Channel Sales and Head of Sales on matters related to the adaptations & execution of the Channel Growth Action Plans Channel Reporting and Database Management Regular reporting matters and consolidating of data across the relevant channels and business units Monitor Sales Dashboard to support internal and external customers’ requirements Support the Execution Team in managing the Indirect Program / Channel Database Management (CDM) Brand Program Support all Brand Initiatives for Home & Distribution Assisting and participate in Brand Programs and Execution Strategy for the Point-of-Sales (PoS) Work alongside sales and channels team to drive PoS Brand Programs Others Hold ownership and monitor the creation or expiry of product certification of conformity with internal stakeholders as well as external vendors  What qualifications will make you successful? Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Business / Finance / Accounting / Business Analytics / Mathematical Sciences or similar fields Ability to navigate in ambiguous environment and have good judgement skills Ability to work in a fast-paced, international team environment Strong verbal and written communication skills Result-oriented, attention to details, proactive, dynamic, and effective individuals Strong technology and digital skills  What's in it for me? Competitive internship allowance Fliexible work arrangement - flexi-hours, office hoteling Medical coverage Blue Sky Friday Onsite gym and more!  Let us learn about you! Apply today.  Why us?  Schneider Electric is leading the digital transformation of energy management and automation. Our technologies enable the world to use energy in a safe, efficient and sustainable manner. We strive to promote a global economy that is both ecologically viable and highly productive.  €25.7bn global revenue  137 000+ employees in 100+ countries  45% of revenue from IoT  5% of revenue devoted for R&D  You must submit an online application to be considered for any position with us. This position will be posted until filled  It is the policy of Schneider Electric to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities in the areas of recruiting, hiring, training, transferring, and promoting all qualified individuals regardless of race, religion, color, gender, disability, national origin, ancestry, age, military status, sexual orientation, marital status, or any other legally protected characteristic or conduct. Concerning agencies: Schneider Electric does not accept unsolicited resumes and will not be responsible for fees related to such.

jobTitle: AWS Next Gen Internship Program (January to June 2022)
description: Description The duration for this internship opportunity is from January to June 2022 Applicants to this internship opportunity will need the work authorization for Singapore At Amazon, we are working to be the most customer-centric company on earth. To get there, we need exceptionally talented, bright, and driven people. Amazon is continually evolving and is a place where motivated employees thrive and also where employee ownership and accountability lead to meaningful results.  Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, offering over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally. Millions of customers—including the fastest-growing startups, largest enterprises, and leading government agencies—are using AWS to lower costs, become more agile, and innovate faster.  Amazon is a place where builders can build. Our internships offer exceptional opportunities for you to grow your technical and non-technical skills. From day one, you will be working with experienced colleagues who love what they do.  AWS Next Gen Internship Program – Singapore  AWS is looking to hire and develop the next generation of leaders for our organization. We are seeking talented and enthusiastic students who are passionate about solving business problems, innovating and building new processes, and leading high-impact initiatives. The Next Gen Internship Program allows you to gain exposure to the AWS business and our unique Amazonian culture through a rewarding learning experience. For this semester internship (January to June 2022), interns will be based in our Singapore office, and will be assigned to one of the following functions. Sales Sales Strategy, Operations and Enablement As an intern, you will independently own a key business project that can drive business value, and tasks to support your assigned team. You will hone your leadership and presentation skills, and apply your creativity to innovate for our business. At the end of your internship, all interns will present their project learnings and proposal to a panel of AWS leaders.  Are you ready to embrace the challenge? Come build the future with us.  About The Functions Sales: The sales teams develop and execute against a territory plan to drive revenue and market share. Our sales teams work directly with customers and drive business growth by articulating compelling value propositions for AWS services, drive customer adoption of AWS, and ensure customer satisfaction. Sales Strategy, Operations and Enablement: the sales strategy and operations teams act as the trusted partner to the sales leaders and sales teams they support. They work closely with the management team to develop, implement, and manage business processes, reports and strategies that optimize business functions to meet organizational goals. Who are we looking for?  The Ideal Candidate Has business acumen, and is able to work independently and as part of a team Strong interpersonal skills required Is curious to learn, and has a ‘can-do’ attitude with strong ownership Adept at problem-solving, and can come up with creative and innovative solutions Results driven with analytical capability to provide data-driven insights Able to multi-task and prioritize competing stakeholder requests Is comfortable working independently in a fast-paced and dynamic environment  Basic Qualifications Penultimate year student working towards a Bachelor’s degree Expected to graduate after May 2022 Candidates must be able to legally work in Singapore Able to commit to a full-time internship from January to June 2022 Analytical and quantitative skills, with the ability to use Excel or other software to provide data to support analyses Excellent English written and verbal communication skills  Preferred Qualifications  Important Note for Application  Skills  As written communications skills are an important aspect of the culture at Amazon, please choose and respond to one of the two questions below for your application  You must attach a one page written response with your resume (saved in PDF or Microsoft Word format), and upload this as part of your application. For this one page written response (do not use bullet points), please follow the instructions below: Define innovation using anecdotal examples, and professional experiences. Why is it always Day 1? The questions are designed so that they can be interpreted in multiple ways. You must respond in narrative form (do not use bullet points). Do not include any confidential information in your responses. We will evaluate your writing based on your clarity of thought and expression, and the organization and structure of your written response.  Note: We will only consider applications with the one page written response, and uploaded together with your resume.   Company - Amazon Web Services Singapore  Job ID: A1716445
industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

description: The Management Trainee Program (MTP) is a management development program designed to groom selected aspiring candidates into future managers in 6 months.  The program is designed to provide participants the best hands-on training experience with support from top-performing managers. You will start as a management trainee and going through a 24 weeks programme learning the leads, sales, manager and future head in various office in Asia.  There will be incentives and variable bonuses entitlement based on performance. High rewarding income and career progression await the potential achievers who have the desire to learn and grow through our training program and mentorship!  Candidate must possess at least Higher secondary/Pre-U/A level/College, Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree/Post-Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree.  No work experience and mid-career change are welcomed to apply as training will be provided.  The candidate may be required to complete a personality profile test upon interview.

jobTitle: Business Developer Intern - Amazon Seller Services (January to June 2022)
description: Description The duration for this internship opportunity is from January to June 2022 Applicants to this internship opportunity will need the work authorization for Singapore Work hard. Have fun. Make history. At Amazon we expect no more and no less from you. Ever since Amazon opened its virtual doors, it has been the aim to become the most customer-centric company in the world. How is this achieved? By having people like you who make sure that customers find everything that they are looking for online – at great prices and convenience.  Amazon is looking for a highly motivated Business Development Intern to help drive lead generation and qualification, and sales enablement to support the third-party Sellers for Amazon.sg. This role offers the unique opportunity to support third-party Sellers across SEA to expand their business from prospecting, qualifying and educating sellers to be successful via both high touch and scalable support. The ideal candidate will also be in charge of projects to support the Amazon Seller Services Business in meeting its account acquisition and output goals. Specifically, this individual will be responsible for building lead databases, creating customized assets for driving sales enablement and drive adoption across 1:many and 1:1 communications.  Background on Amazon Seller Services: The Marketplace or “Selling on Amazon” business exists in 20 countries and exceeds 50% of total Amazon unit sales and growing. Each year, tens of thousands of businesses join the marketplace adding millions of new products. Amazon’s vision is to offer the earth’s largest product selection and lowest prices for our customers. One way we deliver on this vision is by marketing to local country Sellers to persuade them to launch their products onto the platform thereby maximizing the quantity of items that they list while ensuring the highest quality of product images and information.  Core Responsibilities For This Role Include Prospect, call, and qualify the highest potential Selling Partners that deliver competitive selection, pricing and product availability to our Customers. Analyze and proposed the lead source strategy by product categories split by domestic and oversea sellers Implement and track metrics for recording the success and quality of the sellers, along with maintain SOPs on Salesforce Create customized assets for driving sales enablement and drive adoption across 1:many and 1:1 communications - from pitching, seller education, SOPs, category insights to best practices in driving seller performance Initiated, owned and launched Seller Referral Program Present a report on the above projects, including performance analysis, learning and next steps/recommendations by the end of internship  Basic Qualifications Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree Expected to graduate after June 2022 Able to commit for a full-time internship from January to June 2022 Possess the required work rights for Singapore Strong written and verbal communication skills in English Strong passion for sales Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Great team player Highly analytical with the ability to manipulate data Ability to work in fast-paced environment and deal with ambiguity Intermediate Microsoft Office Skills, particularly Excel Preferred Qualifications Prior internship/experience in lead generation/qualification and sales in e-commerce or consumer products companies Ability to quickly adapt to changing priorities and generate innovative solutions fast-pace environment Experience using analytical, marketing, and productivity tools including Oracle Business Intelligence, Salesforce or other CRM tools, Microsoft OneNote, and Microsoft SharePoint. Ability to meet deadlines, prioritize workloads, maintain a strong attention to detail, and work independently in a fast-pace and rapidly changing environment  Company - Amazon Asia-Pacific Holdings  Job ID: A1726201
industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

The Management Trainee works closely and reports to Outlet Manager; and is responsible with daily operations and maintaining customer satisfaction by managing customer complaints and rectifying customer problems.  To be successful Management Trainee, the candidate should implement measures to improve profitability and minimise costs. An outstanding Management Trainee also contributes to the professional development of our team members.  Duties And Responsibilities Achieves optimal business performance of the restaurant through analysing, planning restaurant sales and profitability Assists the Outlet/Assistant Manager in staff management: recruitment, training, evaluation and promotion Maintains an accurate and up-to-date plan of restaurant staffing needs, approving schedule labour hours, and ensures that the restaurant is staffed for all shifts Responsible for department’s equipment, maintenance & storage Prepares reports at the end of the week, including staff control, inventory, staff weekly performance report Maintains a safe working and customer environment is in place to reduce the risk of injuries/accidents and completes incident reports and safety audits promptly. Ensures the strict compliance by all service and kitchen staff to company’s standard operating procedures The above main duties are not exhaustive, and there may be additional/other ad-hoc duties deemed fit by Management Requirements Proficient in full spectrum of casual dine-in F&B function Good analytical, problem solving and decision making skills Possess exceptional communication and interpersonal skills to maintain good relationship with diverse guests and team members Able to lead, manage and motivate the team Excellent vision required for seating guests, expediting food, cleaning equipment, reading floor plans, charts and schedules Always maintain high standard of personal hygiene with clean appearance and neatly attired Possess enthusiasm in learning and keen to get feedback for improvement Possess strong barista and bar experience Previous supervisory experience, preferably F&B Ability to engage in physical activities which requires long hours of standing during shift. Require to work on rotating shift basis which include weekends and public holidays.
industries: Restaurants, Food & Beverages, and Hospitality

description: About EVFY EVFY - An apt merger of logtech and traditional logistics businesses, with a mission to evfy delivery fleets, contributing towards the goal of the Singapore Green Plan 2030. Evfy is the first company in Singapore to own a 100% electric vehicle fleet, which at the point of writing is one of the largest ev fleet owners on the island. Proprietary logtech and crowdsourcing algorithms to enhance fleet management and operations for all last mile logistic needs. Evfy’s mission is zero carbon emissions and contribution to green logistic initiatives.  Vision - “To be the ‘best-in-class’ sustainable logistics company of the region by electrifying last-mile logistics through a driver-centric approach. We aim to be the thought leader in the green last-mile logistics sector, constantly staying ahead by pioneering sustainable initiatives that provide value for the environment, our drivers and our customers.”  Mission - “To make a social impact with businesses and consumers to adopt sustainable and environment friendly options, now.”  Position We are looking for a passionate Business Operations intern to join the Evfy team! You will be ensuring the smooth running of daily operations by coordinating with various stakeholders. You will also be looking at the different aspects of the business processes to improve the operations flow by analyzing, designing and implementing tech-driven solutions to achieve efficiency.  This internship will help you acquire the relevant management and organizational skills and knowledge. You will gain a deeper understanding of how to optimise business operations and gain skills to equip you in excelling in a fast-paced environment.  Job Description • Ensure smooth running of daily operations • Handle internal clients & partner support services, including allocation & fulfillment • Analyse business processes and perform business flows optimisations • Implement tech-driven automation to improve operational effectiveness • Manage and utilise back-end databases • Experience hands-on business and sales operations management  Requirements • Knowledge in data analytics and experience in data analytic tools will be a plus • A team player who is willing to learn and communicate across departments • Able to work in smaller teams with good oversight for multiple tasks on hand • Commercially aware, self-motivated and proactive • An agile learner who adapts well in a fast-growing environment while keeping attention to detail  Working Environment & Culture • Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics! • Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting • Small Close-Knit Team  • Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities  • Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities, Covid Restriction Compliance • Inclusive & Enjoyable Company Culture

THE COMPANY BlueBasket is a Premium K-Select Mart here in SG that brings the unique flavours of Korea directly to Singapore. Not only do we import products from Singapore, we also create brands of our own ranges of food products and we are a fast-growth, quick-paced, and fast-moving e-Commerce company.  THE CULTURE We are a start-up that's just over a year old and looking to grow our team with fun-loving, eager and enthusiastic individuals such as yourself! We focus on creativity, open communication, and empowering of our employees through autonomy and self-driven goals. Work alongside passionate individuals who share a like-minded fervor to introduce the amazing qualities of Korea that Singapore has yet to see.  THE ROLE BlueBasket is looking for an intern (6 months) who is interested in Korean culture to work with us on content creation. On top of getting a feel of how it is in a high-growth startup, you will get hands-on experience with personally curating content for Korean products.  THE TASKS E-commerce Marketing Customize and curate content to transition understanding of Korean products and brands to local consumers Sourcing images, videos, and product detail from our partner brands from Korea Understanding of the various e-Commerce sellers' platform and existing functions Create and edit listings on e-Commerce platforms for new and existing products, manage the sales and plan creative marketing strategies Work closely with the Marketing Team on the respective online stores on BlueBasket & marketplaces, e.g. Facebook, Shopee, Lazada to create applicable content Coordinate with the Merchandising Team on new product arrivals & brand launches Utilization of content, promotions and sales from other platforms to drive sales  Constantly identifying, developing & experimenting on new initiatives to achieve marketing goals  Social Media / Creative Content Ideation and visualization of social media content on various platforms Work together with other members of the team to curate content Research and benchmark with other social media platforms and content Aid in content creation for ads and social media platforms  SKILLS & REQUIREMENTS Relevant Diploma or Degree with disciplines in Digital Marketing, Digital Media, E-commerce or equivalent Good written & spoken communication skills in English Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to work independently and in teams. Ability to take initiative, eager to learn and can commit to a period of 6 months Familiarity with social media and e-commerce platforms is a bonus Familiarity with the Korean language (Ability to write/read/speak in Korean a bonus) Singaporean/PR applicants only

About Workato  Workato is the only integration and automation platform that is as simple as it is powerful — and because it's built to power the largest enterprises, it is quite powerful.  Simultaneously, it's a low-code/no-code platform. This empowers any user (dev/non-dev) to painlessly automate workflows across any apps and databases.  We're proud to be named a leader by both Forrester and Gartner and trusted by 7,000+ of the world's top brands such as Box, Grab, Slack, and more. But what is most exciting is that this is only the beginning.  Why join us?  Ultimately, Workato believes in fostering a flexible, trust-oriented culture that empowers everyone to take full ownership of their roles. We are driven by innovation and looking for team players who want to actively build our company.  But, we also believe in balancing productivity with self-care. That's why we offer all of our employees a vibrant and dynamic work environment along with a multitude of benefits they can enjoy inside and outside of their work lives.  If this sounds right up your alley, please submit an application. We look forward to getting to know you!  Also, feel free to check out why: Business Insider named us an "enterprise startup to bet your career on" Forbes' Cloud 100 recognized us as one of the top 100 private cloud companies in the world Deloitte Tech Fast 500 ranked us as the 17th fastest growing tech company in the Bay Area, and 96th in North America Quartz ranked us the #1 large company for remote workers  Responsibilities  We are looking for an exceptional Product Management Intern to join our growing team and help tailor the onboarding experience. In this role, you will research and propose new experiences to help users ramp up using Workato. You will also be responsible to: Gather, develop and communicate ideas between customers, partners and team members Study and understand the product, market and competition Create feature specifications and mocks Engage with sales, marketing, customer success for product release Gather data, monitor, analyze and optimize data to help formulate plans for subsequent product launches Design, plan, launch, monitor, analyze and optimize a product serving various personas (IT, Ops, Sales, CS, HR) in various industries (higher ed, software, hardware, consumer, retail)  [This is a 6 month internship. The opportunity to transit into a permanent, full-time position may be offered to you depending on your work performance amongst other factors.]  Requirements  Qualifications / Experience / Technical Skills Currently pursuing or recently finished a technical or business degree/diploma , or relevant B2B experience in previous internships Exceptional written and verbal communication skills  Soft Skills / Personal Characteristics Passionate and driven about delivering differentiated products A critical thinker who loves to examine and rationalise information presented to you Thoughtful team player, a quick learner, and have a "can do" attitude with a growth mindset Fast mover and comfortable navigating a fast-paced environment Excellent written and oral communication skills in English, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts effectively to a non-technical audience Comfortable articulating ideas and influencing others Strong organizational skills and attention to detail to juggle multiple projects simultaneously

jobTitle: TD Internship - Debt Capital Markets, Origination & Syndicate (January 2022 to June 2022)
description: TD Bank Group  Headquartered in Toronto, Canada, with approximately 90,000 employees in offices around the world, the Toronto-Dominion Bank and its subsidiaries are collectively known as TD Bank Group (TD). TD offers a full range of financial products and services to over 26 million customers worldwide through three key business lines: Canadian Retail including TD Canada Trust, Business Banking, TD Auto Finance (Canada), TD Wealth (Canada), TD Direct Investing and TD Insurance U.S. Retail including TD Bank, America’s Most Convenient Bank, TD Auto Finance (U.S.), TD Wealth (U.S.) and TD’s investment in Schwab Wholesale Banking including TD Securities  TD had CDN$1.7 trillion in assets on July 31, 2021. TD also ranks among the world’s leading online financial services firms, with more than 15 million active online and mobile customers. The Toronto-Dominion Bank trades on the Toronto and New York stock exchanges under the symbol "TD". In Singapore, TD operates as The Toronto-Dominion Bank, Singapore Branch and Toronto Dominion (South East Asia) Limited, which are collectively known as “TD Singapore” since 1979. The key business in Singapore is TD Securities which is part of Wholesale Banking.  Internship Program The intern will have the opportunity to sit with the business in the Front Office, mainly with the following departments: Fixed Income Sales, Foreign Exchange Sales, Debt Capital Markets Origination & Syndication and Research & Strategy during the 6 month-internship. The intern will also gain experience on the operations and processes adopted by the teams. The Intern will also acquire broad banking knowledge and have excellent opportunity to experience day-to-day life on the trading floor and to work together with an international team.  Objectives The intern will aim to gain a strong understanding of the following: Intricate understanding of international fixed income markets Pricing and valuation of fixed income and derivative products Running new issue book build and hedging Exposure to a wide variety of markets and products, G10 and EM Primary market debt origination and syndication process Work closely with global partners in New York, Toronto, London, Tokyo and Hong Kong  Attributes The intern should possess the following attributes: Team-oriented attitude Strong communication skills Interest in financial markets with a specific focus on sovereign and corporate bonds Prior experience in a financial institution will be advantageous Demonstrates initiative, flexibility and commitment Ability to handle pressure and work in a fast-paced environment Ability and willingness to learn tasks quickly Proficient in Microsoft Office applications, including WORD, POWERPOINT and EXCEL Proficiency in VBA will be a plus Good command of English  Requirements Year 2 and Year 3 Undergraduates Ability to commit for a 6-month full time internship from January 2022 until June 2022  Inclusiveness At TD, we are committed to fostering an inclusive, accessible environment, where all employees and customers feel valued, respected and supported. We are dedicated to building a workforce that reflects the diversity of our customers and communities in which we live and serve, and creating an environment where every employee has the opportunity to reach their potential.
industries: Investment Banking

description: Who We Are  Ready for your next career move in Marketing Technology? Believe in working smart, and want to have fun doing it? Ematic Solutions might just be the place for you!  Established in 2013, we started as an email marketing optimization provider, and today, we have expanded our business to a larger scale in the Digital Marketing landscape. With our headquarters located in Singapore for Ematic Solution, our rapid expansion network has spread across SEA countries and is continually growing. Today, with our global resources, local insights & technology infrastructures, led us to operate over in 9 countries - Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Bosnia.  We’re a global team of 160+ Martech experts and we specialize in various Messaging, Attribution, CDP and Analytics platforms. jobTitle: Marketing Intern - Amazon Global Selling (January to June 2022)
description: Description The duration for this internship opportunity is from January to June 2022 Applicants to this internship opportunity will need the work authorization for Singapore Amazon is seeking a dynamic and motivated Marketing Intern for the Amazon Global Selling business. This individual will be responsible for developing new social media channels and offline opportunities to drive local seller awareness and engagement. This person will work with various marketing channels, which can enable scalable approaches to prospect Seller communities in South East Asia, especially Singapore, Malaysia and Philippines.  Background on Amazon Global Selling: The Marketplace or “Selling on Amazon” business exists in 18 countries and exceeds more than half of total Amazon unit sales and growing. Each year, tens of thousands of businesses join the marketplace adding millions of new products. Amazon’s vision is to offer the earth’s largest product selection and lowest prices for our customers. One way we deliver on this vision is by marketing to local country Sellers to persuade them to launch their products onto the platform thereby maximizing the quantity of items that they list while ensuring the highest quality of product images and information.  The ideal candidates will be an innovator, communicator and problem solver. Candidates will need to be analytical, think and act fast, and be apt at finding creative solutions to complex problems. This is a unique opportunity to play a highly visible role in an exciting and fast-paced business, make history while having fun!  Role And Responsibilities Work with internal stakeholders and analyze data points to identify key focus sellers. Oversee coordination with internal and external stakeholders, third-party engagements and support required for campaign success. Work with partners and internal stakeholders to identify new online and offline activities to build awareness for Amazon Global Selling Develop marketing content for social media channels i.e. Facebook. Oversee pre-event consultation and planning, event logistics, third-party engagements, related travel arrangements, staffing and support required for events Keep track of updated content creation guidelines and resources, develop communication materials for events, review and seek approval ahead of deadlines Develop new webpages to drive traffic and engage with potential sellers in South East Asia  Basic Qualifications Penultimate year student pursuing a Bachelor's degree Graduating after June 2022 Able to commit to a full-time internship from January to June 2022 Past work experience in marketing, marketing communications, preferably in the eCommerce, retail technology, or software industries Proven success in project management and communication skills Demonstrated track record in developing and crafting marketing content Ability to work in fast-paced environment and deal with ambiguity Strong written and verbal communication skills in English Preferred Qualifications Digital design experience and understanding for marketing design guidelines Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign  Company - Amazon Asia-Pacific Holdings  Job ID: A1726206
